goal.core.agent

Class DefaultEnvironmentCapabilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.core.agent.DefaultEnvironmentCapabilities
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnvironmentCapabilities

    public class DefaultEnvironmentCapabilities
extends java.lang.Object
implements EnvironmentCapabilities
    Provides the Agents EnvironmentCapabilities through an EnvironmentPort. The environment port is shared between multiple agents and provides more functionality then needed by the agent. This hides these details from the agent.
    Author:
    mpkorstanje
